DOC.brief_summary: Anemia common pathology geriatrics . According World Health Organization affect 23.9 % subject 60 year world , 8 % patient 60 year Europe . A prevalence increase age twice individual 85 year .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Signs Symptoms Anemia Patients Over 75 Years
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Adult 75 year old , male female Exclusion criterion : Transfusion within 3 month , acute anemia / deglobulisation
